verse: ह्लादिनी संधिनी संवित् त्वय्येका सर्वसंश्रये । ह्लादतापकरी मिश्रा त्वयि नो गुणवर्जिते॥

terms.ह्लादतापकरी: That which causes both joy and suffering

meaning: Meaning: O Supreme Being, in you alone resides the power to bring joy and unite all. Both joy and suffering are mixed within you, but you are devoid of any imperfections.
